name: Introduction to Earth Science
description: This course provides an introduction to Earth Science, covering a range of topics such as geology, oceanography, meteorology, and astronomy.

name: Physical Geology
description: This course provides an in-depth look at the physical components of geology, such as plate tectonics, rock formation, and erosion.

name: Historical Geology
description: This course provides an overview of the history of Earth, covering topics such as evolution, extinction, and Earth's changing climate.

name: Paleontology
description: This course provides an in-depth look at the science of paleontology, covering topics such as fossil formation, fossil identification, and evolutionary theory.
